creator: manero@manero.org
text:
<%@ taglib uri="http://jakarta.apache.org/taglibs/scrape-1.0" prefix="scrape" %>

This fails. I am attempting to scrape info off a shoutcast page. I can scrape data off the URL "http://artemis.drwilco.net" just fine, but when I put a port at the end, the scrape fails. No exception is thrown in the page, only blank data is returned from the scrape.
